objects.name: Analytic 0007
objects.description: Adversary with access to domain management tools (e.g., `realmd`, `samba-tool`, `ldapmodify`) creates a new domain user via command-line utilities. Behavior chain: LDAP command or script triggers → user entry added in AD via Kerberos/LDAP traffic.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execution of realmd, samba-tool, or ldapmodify with user-related arguments

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: NSM:Flow
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: TGS-REQ and AS-REQ seen for new user shortly after domain-modifying process

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: realmd, samba-tool, ldapmodify or custom script
Expected Kerberos traffic from new domain account within X minutes of command
Script execution from interactive shell vs scheduled task
